metadata.name: Pinning hopes on other human beings.
metadata.description:
The reason you should never put hope on someone is because in this world there is no perfect human being. A human being who can always meet the expectations we make. 

It is precisely that everyone is not spared by the name of mistakes. So, don't have too much hope for him so as not to swallow disappointment. Because you know that no man is perfect, therefore stop to depend on others.
